summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Park and Recreation Department; authorizing a contract with the Seattle-King County Economic Opportunity Board, Inc., New Careers Project; establishing for a 25 week period the half-time positions of New Career Program Coordinator, Park and Recreation, and Stenographer Clerk II, and 6 new positions of New Career Trainee, Park and Recreation; increasing the segregation "Salaries-General" in the 1968 Budget of the Park Department; making reimbursable appropriations from the Emergency Fund and Park and Recreation Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
